name: Money Run
description:
Life is not easy when you walk into a bank with a tommy gun in your hand. For some reason people start screaming and calling police. 
You've just robbed the bank and now it is time to leave with some hard cash.

It's not an easy walk and sacrifices must be made along the way.
How much are you ready to lose to get away from pursuit?

Money worth nothing when out of ammo.

Our team's first time entry for Ludum Dare 43. Created in 72 hours with theme "Sacrifices must be made"
Now that was some challenge to make it all in time. Like in action movies we were jumping on a train when it was already leaving the railway station.

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/43/money-run

#moneyrun #ludumdare #talltroll #indiegames #gamedev #indiedev #game #gaming #indie #videogame #talltrollgames

Bug report 06.12.2018
- We have replaced music preview from audiojungle with the purchased one. Music remained the same.
- Police stopped shooting in the middle of the level.
- Some sprites rendered in the wrong order.
